text: Gareth Daniel Thomas (12 February 1945 â€“ 13 April 2016) was a Welsh actor. He was best known for his role as Roj Blake in the BBC science fiction television series Blake's 7, but appeared in many other movies and television programmes, including Shem in the ITV sci-fi series Star Maidens and Adam Brake in the fantasy series Children of the Stones. Thomas died of heart failure in Surrey, Greater London on 13 April 2016, aged 71. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Hermit.org: Biography and role listing * Obituary - BBC Category:1945 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Welsh movie actors Category:Welsh television actors
